meanings.definition: A man of low birth; a churl.
meanings.sent1: Carl worked hard in the fields every day.
meanings.sent2: The carl lived in a small cottage on the outskirts of town.
meanings.sent3: Despite his carl status, he had a heart of gold.
meanings.sent4: The carl's rough hands told the story of his labor.
meanings.sent5: The carl's humble demeanor won the villagers' respect.

meanings.sent1: Carl is excited to celebrate his birthday.
meanings.sent2: I met a friendly man named Carl at the park.
meanings.sent3: Carl's name always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: In the story, Carl symbolizes strength and determination.
meanings.sent5: The name Carl echoes through the halls of history.
